definitions.definition: grant to (someone) the use of (something) on the understanding that it shall be returned.
examples: Stewart asked me to lend him my car
synonyms: let someone use; advance "I'll lend you my towel"

definitions.definition: allow (a person or organization) the use of (a sum of money) under an agreement to pay it back later, typically with interest.
examples: no one would lend him the money

definitions.definition: contribute or add (something, especially a quality) to.
examples: the smile lent his face a boyish charm
synonyms: contribute "these examples lend weight to his assertions"

examples: John stiffly lent himself to her enthusiastic embraces
bay windows lend themselves to blinds
synonyms: be applicable for "the terrain lends itself to downhill skiing"
